Text: yeah! another new version of KMSnano!
yeah man! it's great now I fully understand how this KMS work!!
Cannot activate Windows 8 Pro with Media Center.

I realize in order to use VL Office and activate it I have to convert a legit retail install to VL, how does this affect my license for Win 8, will I have to reactivate it every 180 days as well and is there any way to revert Windows to retail after the office install?

Thanks, think I was a bit unclear.
I was talking about buying Windows 8 Pro retail and activate it so I have a permanent legit activation, then install Office 2013 VL and use your activator to activate it. To do so I guess I have to convert my retail OS to VL and wondered how that will affect my license/activation and secondly if it would be possible after the Office install to convert my OS back from VL to SL (think I saw something about it being possible with slmgr).

Sorry for spamming, but here's a twist to my question, testing in VMware before I go live and Office 2013 VL actually installed without complaints and activated with your activator on a unactivated Win 8 Pro retail copy (no VL conversion). Only think when checking status was this warning message:
ERROR CODE: 0x4004F040 (for information purposes only as the status is licensed)

ERROR DESCRIPTION: The Software Licensing Service reported that the product was
activated but the owner should verify the Product Use Rights.

Office programs still run though and info shows them as activated!
